She answered by an enigmatic half-smile.

Creep: Ah! But isn't killing some=
one a punishment for them? That, I
consider as art. If what you mean is if =
I like to kill without being
punished, well... [she walked closer to him, l=
ooking at him in the
optics] what do you propose?
